sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./Features.css"; // Our separate CSS with scoped classes const Features = () => { const features = [ { icon: "fas fa-file-alt", title: "Legal Templates", description: "Comprehensive collection of ready-to-use templates:", items: [ "Petitions, Plaints, Written Statements", "Complaints, Counters, Arguments", "RTI (Tamil & English)", "Govt Applications, Contracts, MoUs", "Police Complaints, FIR, Matrimonial Docs" ] }, { icon: "fas fa-gavel", title: "Auto-Drafting Engine", description: "AI-powered assistance for better drafting:", items: [ "Clause-level Suggestions", "Risk Scoring", "Auto-fill Features", "Title Deed Opinion Drafts" ] }, { icon: "fas fa-search", title: "OCR + Deep Search", description: "Smart scanning & interpretation:", items: [ "Upload Tamil/English PDF/DOC", "Intelligent OCR Scanning", "Deep Search with Filters", "Legal Document Interpretation" ] } ]; return (

Platform Features

Powerful tools designed for legal professionals and individuals

{features.map((feature, index) => (

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

View Details â†’

{feature.title}

    {feature.items.map((item, i) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}
))}

Ready to experience these features?

); }; export default Features;
